message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm proposing an initial price of $14,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand your position, but $14,000 is closer to its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still looking to keep the price within my budget. Would it be possible to consider $11,000 for the product?
